content: Digging up Dirty DNS Deeds Mobile SEO By: Rand Fishkin September 6, 2005 The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Table of Contents Copied! By: Rand Fishkin September 6, 2005 Digging up Dirty DNS Deeds Mobile SEO The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. SamSpade.org has a fantastic collection of tools for digging up everything from falsified IP addresses to browsing the web anonymously to checking traceroutes, running whois and reverse lookups and much more. The site's super-clean, minimalist layout may lead you to think that you're surfing the web in 1997, but the sophisticated tools really report some impressive stats (and do it fast). The name's killer, too (Spade was originally a detective character created by Dashiell Hammett in the '20s and '30s). Copied! Back to Top
